meanings.definition: The act of not including something.
meanings.sent1: The noninclusion of her name on the list surprised her.
meanings.sent2: The noninclusion of vegetables in his diet led to health issues.
meanings.sent3: The noninclusion of the clown in the circus made the show less entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His noninclusion in the team felt like a rejection of his skills.
meanings.sent5: The noninclusion of the key ingredient ruined the recipe.

meanings.definition: The state of being left out or omitted.
meanings.sent1: The noninclusion of his opinion made him feel unheard.
meanings.sent2: She felt the noninclusion of her friends at the party.
meanings.sent3: The noninclusion of the cat in the family photo made it incomplete.
meanings.sent4: The noninclusion of her in the decision-making process left her feeling isolated.
meanings.sent5: The noninclusion of his name from the credits was a mistake.
